name: Radar Chart
description: Attempting to replicate radar charts featured in a statistical atlas of yore.

name: Color Fingerprints
description: Fun animation of stacked bar charts. Need I say more?

name: Employee Timeline
description: Little timeline of when my co-workers started their employment. Used for a few presentations.

name: Pulsing Map
description: Bubbles invading the U.S.! Run! Actually, just some event data over time.

name: Funnel Tree
description: Kind of like a conversion funnel - but with a bit more structure, and some branching. A funnel tree!

name: TreeMaps
description: TreeMaps from the 1870s! Can you believe this graphic was used in the 1870 Statistical Atlas? It looks pretty modern to me (apart from the colors and data, of course).
